summary.span: 表示在 XML Web service 发现期间发现的、已下载到客户端的文档的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of documents discovered during XML Web services discovery that have been downloaded to the client.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 属性 的类型为 。The property of is of type . ## Examples 下面的代码示例制定 XML Web service 发现并将发现的文档下载到客户端。The following code example enacts XML Web service discovery and downloads the discovered documents to the client. 中发现文档的名称 将输出到控制台。The names of the discovery documents within the are output to the console.
